author: Special Correspondent
text:
Boy held for murder

Police have arrested a fellow student in connection with murder of the first-year polytechnic student under Uthapanaickanoor police station limits on Thursday evening. The police arrested the 16-year-old boy, his classmate, on charge of murdering, K. Subash, with a motive to snatch his laptop, Deputy Superintendent of Police (Usilampatti) K. Saravanakumar said. Though first-year students were prohibited from bringing laptops to college, the deceased had taken the State government-given laptop to college on Thursday to install the operating system. The accused wanted to rob it from him since his (the accused) laptop had developed a snag. He took him to a secluded place on the promise of installing the operating system and hit his head with a boulder and killed him. Meanwhile, the body of the deceased was taken to the boy’s native place in Tirunelveli after post-mortem.
title: Minor boy held for murder
